payment_transaction = state_change['object']
 portal = payment_transaction.getPortalObject()
 service = portal.portal_secure_payments.find()
 integration_tool = portal.restrictedTraverse(portal.portal_preferences.getPreferredPayzenIntegrationSite())
 
 system_event_kw = {
 'portal_type': 'Soap Event',
 'source_value': service,
 'destination_value': payment_transaction,
 }
 sent = portal.system_event_module.newContent(title='Sent', **system_event_kw)
 
 transaction_id = integration_tool.getMappingFromCategory('causality/%s' % payment_transaction.getRelativeUrl())
 if transaction_id == 'Causality/%s' % payment_transaction.getRelativeUrl():
 sent.confirm(comment='Transaction not registered in payzen integration tool')
 return
 transaction_id = transaction_id.split('/')[1]
 transmissionDate, transactionId = transaction_id.split('_')
 
 data_kw, signature, sent_text, received_text = service.soap_getInfo(DateTime(transmissionDate).toZone('UTC').asdatetime(), transactionId)
 sent.edit(text_content=sent_text)
 sent.confirm()
 sent.acknowledge(comment='Automatic acknowledge as result of correct communication')
 received = portal.system_event_module.newContent(title='Received', text_content=received_text, predecessor_value=sent, **system_event_kw)
 
 context.PaymentTransaction_processUpdate(state_change, data_kw, signature, system_event=received.getRelativeUrl())
